name: One Night at MX's
description:
Story: Lucas has escape from MX, and he decided to take the new and improved: PC port Pizza Restaurant! but all MX and his friends are now Robot slaves.

Will you survive and win $10000K 

Sonic PC port by John-Kun

Mario PC port by Taco Games

FNF Hypnos Lullaby by Banbuds

Fnaf by Scott Cawthon

Original game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/724334977/
